name: IncrediBots Replay File
summary: Learn about .IBRE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: To create an IBRE file, select "Save Replay," click "Save," name the file, choose the save location, and click "Save." To load an IBRE file, select File â†’ Load Replay, choose the IBRE file, and click "Open."
NOTE: You must have Adobe Flash Player installed in order to play the IncrediBots game.

description: Replay file used by IncrediBots, a robot physics puzzle game written in Flash; stores a replay of a user's gameplay.
